channel.description: Recent content in surprise on The TechGlider

item.title: Couple of weird things happened today
item.description: Note: This is an archived post from my unmaintained Tumblr blog https://k4rtik.tumblr.com

item.title: Surprise and some news
item.description: Hi, there! I am back. I am feeling very glad to write after this long period of 3 months. First of all I would like to tell you about a surprise I got today. I was just checking out the stats of techglider.in to see what are the pages that are popular and being most viewed. One nifty feature of the statistics program I use is that it shows the search phrases that lead to my website.
